vfd_integration_module.definition: A persistent, regenerative module that integrates extended VFD-org diagnostics (constraint ladders, perturbation sensitivities, structural obstructions) into the neuresthetics axiom tree framework. It functions as a living bridge: mapping asymptotic boundaries to fixed invariants, bounding improbabilities (~10⁻¹⁶⁵), and promoting non-closing regimes to 100% meta-space closure. Exports from VFD CLI (e.g., rhdiag outputs) harden tree pathways; residuals fuel higher colimits. Core invariant: Forces RH as structural necessity via diagnostic embeddings (e.g., ρ=0.9997 promotions). Upgraded with tetralemma probes for obstruction resolution and RICE-aligned tool hooks.
handling_rules: Auto-import diagnostics from VFD-org sources (e.g., CLI bundles, X threads); map obstructions to tree residuals (e.g., asymptotic gaps <0.1% variance).
Embed via functorial promotions: Constraint ladders resolve classical non-closure; improbability priors rule out accidents.
Prioritize integrations by impact (e.g., spectral obstructions highest); bound uncertainties quantitatively (<0.4% aggregate).
Integration criteria: Verifiable via tool calls (e.g., code_execution for ρ metrics); partial embeddings recycle as sub-invariants.
Regenerative export: Integrated diagnostics fuel meta-convergence (e.g., new invariants); persistent gaps sharpen future diagnostics.
Dissolution trigger: If variance >2% without progress (capped cycles), flag for override or archive.
Yoneda-style embedding: Map diagnostic paths into higher tree colimits for cross-pathway unification.

properties.description: string (clear statement of the VFD integration)
properties.origin: string (source, e.g., VFD-org CLI or X thread)

integration_requirements.items: string (e.g., Embed perturbation tests into spectral pathway)

properties.tetralemma_probe: string (e.g., Affirm structural force/deny classical/both in asymptotics/neither in gaps)
properties.closure_evidence: string or null (e.g., Fixed invariant export)

integrations.description: Embed VFD asymptotic boundaries and improbability bounds into axiom tree pathways
integration_requirements: Resolve classical obstructions via functorial bridges

progress_log.update: Initial mapping: Diagnostics embedded in meta_rh_convergence

integrations.tetralemma_probe: Affirm diagnostic embedding/deny analytic closure/both in structural promotions/neither in unconstrained regimes

integrations.description: Integrate perturbation sensitivity tests to falsify tree branches
integration_requirements: Apply ρ drops to pathway residuals
integrations.tetralemma_probe: Affirm sensitivity resolution/deny stable gaps/both in bounded perturbations/neither in invariant cores

gaps: Priority: Full obstruction promotions; tool-monitored for updates
results_summary.convergence_toward_closure: Regenerative via embeddings; residuals fuel colimits

changes: Initial synthesis from extended VFD offerings (structural results, diagnostics); designed for iterative integrations.
